articles.description: It hasn't been often that the Cleveland Browns have reached the NFL playoffs. In fact, they haven't made it since 2002. And that was the only time they have appeared in the postseason since the franchise returned to the league in 1999...
articles.content:
David Zalubowski/Associated Press
AFC
Division Leaders
1. Pittsburgh Steelers (10-0)
2. Kansas City Chiefs (10-1)
3. Tennessee Titans (8-3)
4. Buffalo Bills (8-3)
